articles.title: Pregnant women who use vapes or snus 'increase baby's risk of sudden death three-fold' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Snus is sold in most convenience stores in the US and has become popular among Americans looking to give up traditional cigarettes, as have vapes and other nicotine products.
articles.content:
Vaping or using snus during pregnancy raises the risk of sudden infant death by up to three times, a study suggests.
